name: Pronto Pronto Cocktail
garnish: 1 Basil leaf, lime wheel and lemon wheel
preparation:
In a shaker, muddle the lime juice and basil.
Add the remaining ingredients except the club soda and fill with ice.
Shake vigorously and strain into a highball glass.
Top with the soda and garnish with a basil leaf, lime wheel and lemon wheel.
